abstract: German high court rules that Catholics are free to leave the church, thus avoiding a tax that is used to support religious institutions; decision rankles Catholic bishops, who see ruling as yet another threat to their influence on modern German society.
lead_paragraph: The court had ruled that Catholics are free to leave the church, thus avoiding a tax that is collected by the government.
